ComicInfo.Summary:
Tramp Gimpy, with help from The Three, sets out to find Zero, who is being blackmailed into appearing in stuntman Cousin George's stage show.
Dare lands on an uncharted world and discovers a community of pilgrims whose ancestors were transported there in 1621. After beating off a Vrakk attack Dare and his men are just settling down for the night when Johannsen shows up in a state of shock.
Bob Booth, last president of the USA, is accidentally freed from suspended animation by some hillbillies who think he's a vampire. Dredd shows up in time and explains Booth was sentenced to 100 years suspended animation for starting the Atomic Wars. Then sentences him to life - helping the hillbillies reclaim the badlands.
Friendly, telepathic, creatures lead Lorna and Mike to safety in a blizzard. The rest of the survivors catch up. Next day, as they are exploring, the Lady in Black shows up and lures away one of the colonist's children.
In the middle of the cup match between the Hellcats and the Freaks, Clay goes toe-to-toe with the homicidal Gruber. Gruber eventually puts Clay down, then douses him with petrol as the rest of the players stand helplessly by on the sidelines.
